full_sentence: This dark female, I am not going to use the human designation of woman, is just as delusional as the rest of her kind.

topics.sentence_slice: delusional as the rest of her kind

full_sentence: Never entertain Air B&B landlords who ask for a deposit. They have this scam where they offer to come to your new house with keys but then at the last minute make up an excuse along the lines of "I got lost in an Uber'. Then they take your cash and never show up. Focus on yourself. I don't even trust hotels these days.
